answer: Seapol is a group of companies offering end-to-end logistics services, including shipping, port handling, trading, and air cargo solutions.
Seapol provides a wide range of services through its various divisions: Seaport Logistics, Seaport Shipping, Seaport Lines, Seapol Port, Eastern Bulk Trading, and Airpol Xpress.
